messages.content: What does ComfyUI-SaveQueues add to ComfyUI?
ComfyUI-SaveQueues adds a button to the menu to save and load the running queue and the pending queues.
What can I do with the queues after using ComfyUI-SaveQueues?
With ComfyUI-SaveQueues, you can save and load the running queue and the pending queues.
Why would I want to use ComfyUI-SaveQueues?
You would want to use ComfyUI-SaveQueues when you want to exit ComfyUI with queues still remaining.
To install ComfyUI-SaveQueues, use `git clone https://github.com/pkpkTech/ComfyUI-SaveQueues` in your ComfyUI custom_nodes directory.
